title: White House to Clarify Gold Tariffs After Ruling Sparked Chaos
summary: The Trump administration suggested it would issue a new policy clarifying that imports of gold bars shouldn’t face tariffs, after a US government agency stunned traders by formally ruling that they’d be subject to duties.
fullContent: The Trump administration suggested it would issue a new policy clarifying that imports of gold bars shouldn’t face tariffs, after a US government agency stunned traders by formally ruling that they’d be subject to duties.
